Uses of Package
org.apache.hc.core5.pool

  • Packages that use org.apache.hc.core5.pool 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hc.core5.http.impl.bootstrap
    HTTP/1.1 requester and server bootstrap.
    org.apache.hc.core5.http2.impl.nio.bootstrap
    HTTP/2 capable requester and server bootstrap.
    org.apache.hc.core5.pool
    Client side connection pool component APIs.
    org.apache.hc.core5.testing.classic  
  • Classes in org.apache.hc.core5.pool used by org.apache.hc.core5.http.impl.bootstrap 
    Class and Description
    ConnPoolControl
    Interface to control runtime properties of a ConnPool such as maximum total number of connections or maximum connections per route allowed.
    ConnPoolListener
    Connection pool event listener.
    ConnPoolStats
    Interface to obtain connection pool statistics.
    ManagedConnPool
    ConnPool that also implements ConnPoolControl and AutoCloseable.
    PoolConcurrencyPolicy
    Enumeration of pool concurrency policies
    PoolReusePolicy
    Enumeration of pooled connection re-use policies
    PoolStats
    Pool statistics.
  • Classes in org.apache.hc.core5.pool used by org.apache.hc.core5.http2.impl.nio.bootstrap 
    Class and Description
    ConnPoolControl
    Interface to control runtime properties of a ConnPool such as maximum total number of connections or maximum connections per route allowed.
    ConnPoolListener
    Connection pool event listener.
    ConnPoolStats
    Interface to obtain connection pool statistics.
    ManagedConnPool
    ConnPool that also implements ConnPoolControl and AutoCloseable.
    PoolConcurrencyPolicy
    Enumeration of pool concurrency policies
    PoolReusePolicy
    Enumeration of pooled connection re-use policies
  • Classes in org.apache.hc.core5.pool used by org.apache.hc.core5.pool 
    Class and Description
    ConnPool
    ConnPool represents a shared pool connections can be leased from and released back to.
    ConnPoolControl
    Interface to control runtime properties of a ConnPool such as maximum total number of connections or maximum connections per route allowed.
    ConnPoolListener
    Connection pool event listener.
    ConnPoolStats
    Interface to obtain connection pool statistics.
    DisposalCallback
    Represents a customizable disposal strategy for ModalCloseable instances.
    ManagedConnPool
    ConnPool that also implements ConnPoolControl and AutoCloseable.
    PoolConcurrencyPolicy
    Enumeration of pool concurrency policies
    PoolEntry
    Pool entry containing a pool connection object along with its route.
    PoolReusePolicy
    Enumeration of pooled connection re-use policies
    PoolStats
    Pool statistics.
  • Classes in org.apache.hc.core5.pool used by org.apache.hc.core5.testing.classic 
    Class and Description
    ConnPoolListener
    Connection pool event listener.
    ConnPoolStats
    Interface to obtain connection pool statistics.
